title: The Dolce & Gabbana Sponsored Kardashian/Barker Wedding + Luxury & Fast Fashion Scandal
itunes:title: The Dolce & Gabbana Sponsored Kardashian/Barker Wedding + Luxury & Fast Fashion Scandal
itunes:subtitle: When we learn luxury brands are prone to scandals and us normies are left with the scandal of fast fashion
description:
Now that Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are back from their Portofino wedding, the basic and the brain do a full on review of the wedding festivities, from the families outfits, to the food that was served. We discuss in depth how the Dolce & Gabbana event appeared to be an attempt to resuscitate their brand and the reason why: aka how D&G has been knee deep in public scandal (as well as other luxury brands...apparently luxury fashion loves its scandals). We walk you through scandal after scandal and how our current problem as "normies" is really fast fashion and it's massive impact on water pollution, CO2 emissions, unethical labor practices and more.


Join us this week as we try to stay positive and provide a bit of escapism is a world where we're constantly inundated with bad news!



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
